ygData.subject: Re: Smithing and "spoilers"
ygData.msgSnippet: On the Antonica contintent, ore is available in Freeport and also in Grobb (though the latter won t do a bard any good, heh).  I m not sure if it s available
ygData.messageBody:
On the Antonica contintent, ore is available in Freeport and also in Grobb
(though the latter won't do a bard any good, heh). I'm not sure if it's
available anywhere on the Qeynos side of the world. I know that sharpening
stones are not sold in Qeynos; some friends set up quite a business
importing sharpening stones from Highpass to Qeynos and selling them for up
to 5 silver apiece (they cost 3 or 4 copper at the vendor).

- Windsong Wanderer, bard on Solusek Ro
